name: The bearded baby caused panic
description: The bearded baby caused panic. // The news spread that a bearded baby was born in Cerrahpaşa Hospital and immediately spoke and said, "The apocalypse will break on the second day of the feast." // Our readers, who have been calling our newspaper all over Turkey for 3 days, have been saying in trembling voices, "Is it true? Will the apocalypse break? Inform us". // Some of our panicked readers say, "If there is such an event, they should not hide it. Let them publish the picture, let's prepare for the apocalypse".
